objectives.name: Path of Destruction
objectives.description:
At the end of the battle round:
•Score 3 VP if one or more CHARACTER or MONSTER units were destroyed by a melee attack made by a CREATIONS OF BILE model from your army this battle round.
•Score 2 VP if one or more units (excluding CHARACTER, MONSTER or VEHICLE units) were destroyed by a melee attack made by a CREATIONS OF BILE model from your army this battle round.

At the end of the battle, if one or more ADEPTUS ASTARTES, SANCTIC ASTARTES or HERETIC ASTARTES units were destroyed by a melee attack made by a CREATIONS OF BILE model from your army during the battle, score 1 additional VP.
